title: B2B Ecommerce — Jugnu
description: 🚀 Jugnu is the B2B – E-commerce platform, empowering small retailers to reach great heights.
👨‍💻 Led the development of a tailored SaaS-based product for the sales and growth team.
👀 Oversaw the creation of a customer-facing application that ensures a smooth and effortless order placement process.
📱 Restructured the mobile architecture, resulting in an ⬆️ 80% improvement in app size and loading speed.
🏆 Recognized for outstanding efficiency and reliability.

title: Consumer Engagement System — Salesflo
description: 🔥🚀 I spearheaded the creation of Concore, an exciting Consumer Engagement System at Philip Morris International. This cutting-edge project has revolutionized our marketing efforts, boosting consumer engagement to new heights! 💪
📈 As the project lead, I successfully orchestrated the development of Concore, delivering impressive results and driving substantial growth in consumer engagement. 📲
🗺️ By leveraging the power of Google Maps, I expertly planned and executed flawless sales promoter journeys, optimizing productivity and efficiency throughout the process. 📍
🔒 I also implemented state-of-the-art security measures, guaranteeing a secure and dependable platform for our valued users. 💻

title: Distribution Management System — Salesflo
description: 📢 Salesflo 🚀 is the ultimate distribution management system designed specifically for FMCG companies in both 🌍 local and international markets.
It empowers businesses to efficiently handle orders, invoices, and inventory with ease. 💼
💪 Collaborated with the talented BI team to create customized reports that perfectly aligned with the unique needs of the business. 📊
🔧 Utilized AWS Lambda, AWS CloudWatch, and various other cutting-edge AWS Services to optimize system performance and ensure seamless operations. ⚙️💻
